channel.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
channel.description:
[b]Map Name:[/b] dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1 [b]Developer:[/b] gtamike_TSGK [b]Game:[/b] Half Life 2 Deathmatch
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK[/b] ---> [url]https://forum.tsgk.com/viewtopic.php?mode=attach&id=8432[/url]
[b]Brief Description[/b] The map has 8 hallways 4 on the lower level, and 4 on the upper level. On the lower level there are 2 stair ways to get to the 2nd level also 4 lifts and 4 ladders. The main area is the middle lobby this is a nice and open area. The weapon layout has been well thought about and the gameplay is fast. The lighting took along time to get just right.
[b]New features/Gameplay[/b] Added speed ladders, walk/run out of windows and they break; plus 1% glass shard cut damage to player, teleport areas are smaller for faster teleporting, areas where ladders are a bit bigger so you can use the ladder more easily, map lighting completely redone, custom prop textures for explosive barrels and ammo crates, animated models on top of circle glass windows, HD textures, as well as other materials tricks to make textures look nice quality and HD env_cubemap reflections added for best quality.
[b]Pictures[/b] (Click for High Res) More Here [url]https://forum.tsgk.com/viewtopic.php?t=5063[/url]
[url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10008.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/800_600_big_1.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10009.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10009.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10010][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10010.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10003.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10003.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10004.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10004.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10000.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10000.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10014.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10014.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10006.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10006.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10007.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10007.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/big/dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc10023.jpg][img]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/ob_battle_lobby_hd/small/800_600_big_2.jpg[/img][/url]
Enjoy! :slight_smile:
Here's another HD hl2dm map I did this year. [url]https://forum.tsgk.com/viewtopic.php?t=5043[/url]

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
gtamike_TSGK:

RE: Make something original.

There you go lol
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=11071

Now that’s a good looking map; how do you go from that to this? Concept-wise I mean?

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
the old version had more shadows
in that huge hall that is
if you really want to improve the map i suggest playing with the shadows, adding more details and more use of models - brushwork looks horrible, and if you even manage to make something good out of brushwork, chances are it’s going to affect the game performance-wise

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: lunertexcosmo
item.description:
The layout itself looks great. But as everyone else has added, the lighting doesn’t look good at all. It can be tricky to get sometimes, but bad lighting can really wreck a map. And as someone else said above me, you need to add more detail. If not, then maybe scale it down a few sizes. Remember, less is more. It’s better to have a smaller, well lit, and detailed map than an oversized, badly lit, and empty one.

EDIT: Just wanted to add that the other map you linked to looks awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
I’d just suggest add A LOT of detail. You got tons of open space, there is plenty for you to add. When I look at the screenshots I have no idea other than some totally cleaned out building. It also looks like you have allbright on.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
You guys haven’t been on GameBanana.com if you call this terrible. Sure he has to work on it some more but you can see that he already had an idea of what he was doing. I can’t judge the layout because I don’t play Half-Life 2: Deathmatch but it seems fine as a WIP. And the lighting isn’t even bad, I kinda like it. Maybe a few more colours will do it.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
av3nger:

Now we know you’re just an idiot…there are shadows in the screenshots…it’s a W.I.P. and I’m pretty sure he is competent enough to work on it some more. It’s common sense that he knows what is unfinished.

Gtfo that map looks horrid, and why start an entire thread on an unfinished piece of shit? Obviously he needs the criticism.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: fx1
item.description:
This is terrible.

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Savant:

whoa man this looks

horrible

i’m not even kidding

in terms of lighting, i’m not even sure there is any lighting, it’s like you left allbright on
it’s all brushwork with very little attention to detail

the columns could use some smoothing
cubemaps, oh god
the only semi-good thing is the layout, symmetrical, seems fine
but
i don’t even know who’d like to play this horrible mashed potato mess

oh god

2/10 would not play

Now we know you’re just an idiot…there are shadows in the screenshots…it’s a W.I.P. and I’m pretty sure he is competent enough to work on it some more. It’s common sense that he knows what is unfinished.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM MAP: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
item.dc:creator: gtamike_TSGK
item.description:
Map Name: dm_ob_battle_lobby_hd_rc1
Developer: gtamike_TSGK
Game: Half Life 2 Deathmatch

DOWNLOAD LINK
—> https://forum.tsgk.com/viewtopic.php?mode=attach&id=8432

Brief Description
The map has 8 hallways 4 on the lower level, and 4 on the upper level. On the lower
level there are 2 stair ways to get to the 2nd level also 4 lifts and 4 ladders. The main
area is the middle lobby this is a nice and open area. The weapon layout has been
well thought about and the gameplay is fast. The lighting took along time to get just right.

New features/Gameplay
Added speed ladders, walk/run out of windows and they break; plus 1% glass shard cut
damage to player, teleport areas are smaller for faster teleporting, areas where ladders
are a bit bigger so you can use the ladder more easily, map lighting completely redone,
custom prop textures for explosive barrels and ammo crates, animated models on top of
circle glass windows, HD textures, as well as other materials tricks to make textures look
nice quality and HD env_cubemap reflections added for best quality.

Pictures (Click for High Res) More Here https://forum.tsgk.com/viewtopic.php?t=5063

Enjoy!
